tool_description: Tracks and analyzes zoning variances, special permits, and exceptions to identify patterns in regulatory flexibility and potential zoning issues.

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction name or code for variance records

start_date.description: Start date for variance analysis period

end_date.description: End date for variance analysis period

variance_types.description: Types of variances to include: use, area, setback, height, parking

include_denied.description: Whether to include denied variance applications

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: The specified jurisdiction is not found in the variance database.
Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date, and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Invalid variance types: Use one or more of [use, area, setback, height, parking].
No variance data: No variance records found for the specified criteria.
Date range too large: Analysis period cannot exceed 10 years.
usage: Specify jurisdiction, start_date, and end_date for the analysis period. Optionally filter by variance_types and set include_denied for comprehensive analysis.

total_variances.description: Total number of variances in the analysis period

approval_rate.description: Percentage of variances that were approved (0-100)

hotspot_areas.description: Areas with highest concentration of variance requests
